alert.note: Alert for Shiawassee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 10:26AM EDT until April 05 at 11:15AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Shiawassee County in southeastern Michigan... * Until 1115 AM EDT. * At 1026 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near DeWitt, or 7 miles southwest of Laingsburg, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Laingsburg around 1030 AM EDT. Perry and Morrice around 1035 AM EDT. Owosso around 1040 AM EDT. Corunna and Bancroft around 1045 AM EDT. Durand and Lennon around 1050 AM EDT. New Lothrop around 1055 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Juddville, Bennington, Shaftsburg, Carland and Vernon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EDT for southeastern Michigan. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EDT for southeastern Michigan.
